offers.terms: Includes: 20% off Skincare. Image used for illustrative purposes only. Valid online at marksandspencer.com. To redeem this offer online, add the offer to your Sparks card. Offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or unless expressly stated in that offer. Offer can be used once online. Subject to availability and any refunds will take the discount into account. Offer strictly non-transferable and cannot be sold or exchanged for cash. offers.offerName: £5 off when you spend £30 on M&S food in store
offers.offerNameLong: £5 off when you spend £30 on M&S food in store
offers.terms: £5 off when you spend £30 on M&S food in store. Offer can be used once only in a single transaction. In Scotland and Wales, due to minimum unit pricing legislation, beers, wines & spirits will not count towards your spend threshold for this offer and will not be discounted. EXCLUDES: formula milk, gift cards and non-M&S branded items. Image used for illustrative purposes only. Valid in selected UK stores (excluding Channel Islands, M&S Outlet, WHSmith high street stores, and BP Connect stores). Offer cannot be redeemed on Mobile Pay Go. Offer cannot be redeemed online. Offer cannot be redeemed on Ocado.com. Offer cannot be used in conjunction with colleague discount or any other offer, unless expressly stated in that offer. Offer strictly non-transferable and cannot be sold or exchanged for cash. Subject to availability. Any refunds will take the discount into account. Marks & Spencer reserves the right to reject use of this offer with reasonable cause. ©Marks and Spencer plc: Waterside House, 35 North Wharf Road, London W2 1NW.

offers.offerName: Successfully Refer a Friend to Sparks and...
offers.offerNameLong: Successfully Refer a Friend to Sparks and receive a 10% Off Full Basket Offer
offers.terms: Vaild in selected M&S stores in the UK (excluding all stores in the Channel Islands, M&S Outlet stores, BP Connect stores, M&S stores located in airports, motorway services and hospitals) or online at marksandspencer.com and the M&S app. Voucher can be used once only and must be used in a single transaction which is of a value greater than the value of this voucher. Voucher can be used in full or part payment for any items within M&S’ Food, clothing, Homeware and Beauty departments. Voucher cannot be used in full or part payment of any of the following items: schoolwear, furniture, face masks, external brands, stationery, cards and wrap, Made to Measure Shirts, Made to Order Suits, Café travel mug, tailoring alterations, ‘Your School Uniform’ service, furniture disposal service, repairs services, name tapes, charity items and any food items. If the voucher only covers part of the transaction amount, the full balance must be paid. No change will be given. Voucher can be used with colleague discount. Voucher applied after all other discounts (excluding colleague discount, which will be applied last). Voucher is strictly non-transferable and cannot be sold or exchanged for money or money’s worth. Exchanges or refunds will be offered in accordance with your statutory rights. Refunds will be provided in the form of credit notes. Offer cannot be used against purchases made prior to the receipt of this voucher. M&S reserves the right to reject this offer with reasonable cause. © Marks and Spencer plc. Waterside House, 35 North Wharf Road, London W2 1NW. All information correct at time of going to press.
